/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their green leaves contrasting with the clear blue sky above. The road itself is divided into two lanes by a white line, suggesting a well-regulated traffic system. On the right side of the road, there's a sidewalk, inviting pedestrians for a leisurely stroll. The image captures the essence of urban life in Beijing, where nature and cityscape coexist harmoniously.
